title: Media 1 Bedroom Apartment
description:
You've found the perfect location in Media!  This gorgeous one bedroom apartment is located 3 blocks from the town center on a beautiful property in Media. Our Victorian house is located across the street from a nice park and includes a large porch and generous lawn area as common space just waiting for you to enjoy!  The house is well maintained and sits on a lovely corner.  The apartment has 3 large rooms, a kitchen, and a full bath (remodeled  recently) totaling over a 1000 square feet of living space.  This one bedroom is perfectly suited for the couple or single person looking for a lot of living space. The kitchen is nicely equipped with a dishwasher, stove and refrigerator and a new tile floor. There are washer and dryer facilities on the premises, and ample storage in the basement.  Parking is always easy just outside on the street. Utilities that you are responsible for include gas and electric, and combined they average $60/month in the summer and $90/month in the winter. We will be responsible for water, sewer and trash, and lawn care.  If you would have a need for phone or cable utilities, these would also be your responsibility.
Currently the house is occupied so showings will be by appointment only. Please email for more information and additional pictures. The apartment will be available for rent July 1st.
When emailing, we usually have prospective tenants respond to the following:
Who would be living in the house, where each person works and length of employment, length of rental stay planned, and any other information you may think we would find helpful.  We appreciate  you reading this and look forward to connecting with great people!

description:
Come see this incredibly spacious townhome, nestled in a private courtyard! Located within the Meredith School Catchment in Queen Village, this home truly has everything you need from a private outdoor space, to garage parking to open concept living! Upon entering on the 1st floor landing, you will make your way up the stairs into the main living and dining area. The welcoming living area is open concept style and very spacious. The spacious kitchen is equipped with wood cabinetry, gorgeous countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large breakfast bar area. The living space is filled with natural and recessed lighting and also includes a sliding back door which gives access to the back patio area great for grilling and entertaining! The rest of the space is filled with 3 incredibly spacious bedrooms with great closet space, lots of natural light, and high ceilings! Not to mention, the 3rd bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. There are a total of 2.5 bathrooms in this unit and all have their own special characteristics. The first full bathroom includes a modern vanity and a stall shower/tub combo! The 2nd full bathroom features an extra wide vanity countertop, a stall shower and separate soaking tub! The basement is home to the washer/dryer and this unit also features 1 car garage parking as well as 1 outdoor spot, directly outside the garage! Talk about convenience! Now let's talk location. This townhome is perfectly situated in the charming neighborhood of Queen Village where dining and shopping is all around. Check out local favorites like The Bagel Place, Red Hook Coffee and Tea, Cry Baby Pasta, Neighborhood Ramen and so many more! Take Front Street North to experience local neighborhoods like Society Hill, Head House Square, and Old City. Venture a couple blocks West to indulge in all E Passyunk Ave. has to offer! Easy transportation includes I-95 and local bus stops. Does this sound like your new home? If so, come by and see this amazing townhome for yourself by scheduling a showing today!

title: The Custom House in Olde City is a unique condo
description:
The Custom House in Olde City is a unique condo building offering the residents the best the city has to offer... This condo is just steps from shops, restaurants and entertainment and easy access to I95 ... the lobby features a secure camera monitored lobby, elevator and nicely lit hallways... Take the elevator to this top floor unit, quietly located at the end of the hallway... This spacious unit, Two Bedroom /Two Bathroom , is one of the largest in the building, features a great open layout with high vaulted ceilings... You'll enjoy sitting at the island breakfast bar with extra cabinetry and multiple outlets for all your needs... Juliet balcony off the Main bedroom . There is also a utility room with full size washer/dryer…and a storage locker in the basement of the building .

title: Bright and sunny with views
description:
Large two bedroom condo for rent at 2601 Parkway. Bright and sunny with views from front of building and park and from rear of building of neighborhood. Great cross ventilation. Newer kitchen. Updated bath, hardwood floors, and freshly painted. You will love the open floor plan and space. 24-hour doorman and security, beautiful Art Deco lobby with grand piano, bike storage room. Doctor's office off lobby. Rent includes: gas, water, sewer, free shuttle bus to downtown Philadelphia, on-site fitness center/gym, free wifi in lobby, on-site management, package hold area with email notification, express shipment pickup. Tenant pays only electric and cable. Dry cleaning pick up/delivery; restaurant on first floor. Three Septa bus routes within one block; wheelchair accessible. Trash chute on each floor. No smoking in condo. Sense of community: book club, game night, happy hours, community room, Holiday party, Spring Fling. Close to I-76, I-95, 30th Street Train Station, Kelly Drive, Benjamin Franklin Parkway. Walk to Whole Foods, CVS, many fabulous restaurants, many museums (Barnes, Philadelphia Museum of Art, Franklin Institue, Rodin), Schuylkill River bike/walking trail, Waterworks and Boathouse Row. Absolutely no pets.

title: Beautifully situated on the west side of the Square
description:
Welcome to 222 Rittenhouse, an architecturally historic high-rise tower on Rittenhouse Square. Beautifully situated on the west side of the Square, 222 offers revered park side living in Center City s most sought after neighborhood at a terrific value. This handsome 1920 s building welcomes residents with a stunning double height lobby. Choose from luxury studios, one, two and three-bedroom apartments as well as penthouses in a variety of distinctive floor plans. The apartments have been recently renovated to include new kitchen cabinets, countertops, appliances, fixtures, flooring and restored tile bathrooms. Units have central air, in-unit laundry, dishwashers and great closets! Many apartments enjoy views of beautiful Rittenhouse Square and the skyline of Philadelphia. Residents enjoy 24-hour desk services, fitness facility, business lounge and 24 - hour maintenance. The biggest amenity 222 provides is the unbeatable LOCATION. A short walk to UPENN, Drexel University, Chop, Jefferson Hospital, 30th Street Station, central business district, Kimmel Center, Schuylkill River Park, high-end retail and Philadelphia's best bars, cafes, and restaurants. Just $500 Security Deposit and 1st month's rent to move-in! Pets allowed. Extra storage available. Bike storage on site

title: Come see this incredibly spacious townhome
description:
Come see this incredibly spacious townhome, nestled in a private courtyard! Located within the Meredith School Catchment in Queen Village, this home truly has everything you need from a private outdoor space, to garage parking to open concept living! Upon entering on the 1st floor landing, you will make your way up the stairs into the main living and dining area. The welcoming living area is open concept style and very spacious. The spacious kitchen is equipped with wood cabinetry, gorgeous countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large breakfast bar area. The living space is filled with natural and recessed lighting and also includes a sliding back door which gives access to the back patio area great for grilling and entertaining! The rest of the space is filled with 3 incredibly spacious bedrooms with great closet space, lots of natural light, and high ceilings! Not to mention, the 3rd bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. There are a total of 2.5 bathrooms in this unit and all have their own special characteristics. The first full bathroom includes a modern vanity and a stall shower/tub combo! The 2nd full bathroom features an extra wide vanity countertop, a stall shower and separate soaking tub! The basement is home to the washer/dryer and this unit also features 1 car garage parking as well as 1 outdoor spot, directly outside the garage! Talk about convenience! Now let's talk location. This townhome is perfectly situated in the charming neighborhood of Queen Village where dining and shopping is all around. Check out local favorites like The Bagel Place, Red Hook Coffee and Tea, Cry Baby Pasta, Neighborhood Ramen and so many more! Take Front Street North to experience local neighborhoods like Society Hill, Head House Square, and Old City. Venture a couple blocks West to indulge in all E Passyunk Ave. has to offer! Easy transportation includes I-95 and local bus stops. Does this sound like your new home? If so, come by and see this amazing townhome for yourself by scheduling a showing today!

title: This is an amazing 2 bedroom and 2 1/2 bath condo
description:
This is an amazing 2 bedroom and 2 1/2 bath condo unit in the centrally located "23" Condominium building! Enter into this spacious, versatile unit with living room/dining room combo, hallway, powder room, and large windows with 14 feet ceilings. There is an open breakfast bar kitchen with plenty of granite countertop space and stainless appliances. A washer/dryer closet is adjacent to the kitchen for added convenience. A lovely primary bedroom with 2 large closets and ensuite bath provides a comfortable retreat. A second bedroom and second bathroom across the hall complete the unit. The unit comes with a dedicated storage space. The "23" building is luxurious and private and features 24-hour front desk security staffing and a dedicated full-time maintenance team as well as a central outdoor courtyard with waterfall and rooftop gardens which are available for residents to enjoy. The location of "23" is truly second to none in the city- the building is within a short walking distance to 30th St Station, Suburban Square, and Rittenhouse Square, Trader Joe's and much, much more! Multiple SEPTA bus and trolley stops are within 1-2 blocks of the building entrance. The lovely Schuylkill River trail is just steps away providing walking/running/biking opportunities for miles. Penn and Drexel and Jefferson are within easy walking distance. "23" is also zoned for the award-winning Albert M Greenfield elementary school (National Blue-Ribbon Award). Don't miss this opportunity for city living at its best and at an affordable price! (Please note that the sqaure feet is 1384)

title: Single Room in Three Bedroom Fishtown House ~ Big Backyard!
description:
We have an open room in our Fishtown house, it's a three bedroom house with two other people living there. They've both been there for over 5 years - so ideally we'd like someone looking for a long term living situation.
The room itself is on the second floor and is a good size, fits a queen bed with plenty of space for a desk and tons of storage. It has 3 windows, with one facing West towards the sun. The room has a nice little closet to stash your clothes (has a bar for hangers and a top shelf area).
There's a double lot backyard, so it runs very deep and is great for parties/backyard BBQs! We have a gas and charcoal grill, a cement patio, tables/chairs, and a cool little fire pit.
There's one shared bathroom, but this has never been an issue sharing (especially since one of the housemates is rarely ever there). We've had both guys and girls rent here before, no preference on gender (or lack thereof.)
Mail Delivery: Side alley allows for packages to be easily and safely dropped off when no one is home (UPS and USPS have been doing this for years already).
Utilities: ~$70-80 (varies by month and usage, highest is around $120 in the winter if running the heat high). We have Verizon internet, but are also wired for Comcast - we switch between both every couple years to get the best rate. The house has gas heat (PGW) and no central air (we all use window units.)
Basement: Good for storage and nothing else.
It's a ~12 minute walk to the Girard El stop and on a very safe, friendly block. There's currently one cat in the house, she's super cool and has lived with other housemate's dogs/cats in the past. Super close to 95
-----------------------------------------------------
NEXT STEP: Send us a little info about you and we can chat to schedule a tour if it seems like a good fit. Expect to meet the other housemates and chat with them, we want to make sure everyone is happy so it works long term.

The spacious kitchen is equipped with wood cabinetry, gorgeous countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a large breakfast bar area. The living space is filled with natural and recessed lighting and also includes a sliding back door which gives access to the back patio area great for grilling and entertaining! The rest of the space is filled with 3 incredibly spacious bedrooms with great closet space, lots of natural light, and high ceilings! Not to mention, the 3rd bedroom has an ensuite bathroom. There are a total of 2.5 bathrooms in this unit and all have their own special characteristics. The first full bathroom includes a modern vanity and a stall shower/tub combo! The 2nd full bathroom features an extra wide vanity countertop, a stall shower and separate soaking tub! The basement is home to the washer/dryer and this unit also features 1 car garage parking as well as 1 outdoor spot, directly outside the garage! Talk about convenience! Now let's talk location. This townhome is perfectly situated in the charming neighborhood of Queen Village where dining and shopping is all around. Check out local favorites like The Bagel Place, Red Hook Coffee and Tea, Cry Baby Pasta, Neighborhood Ramen and so many more! description:
Large two bedroom condo for rent at 2601 Parkway. Bright and sunny with views from front of building and park and from rear of building of neighborhood. Great cross ventilation. Newer kitchen. Updated bath, hardwood floors, and freshly painted. You will love the open floor plan and space. 24-hour doorman and security, beautiful Art Deco lobby with grand piano, bike storage room. Doctor's office off lobby. Rent includes: gas, water, sewer, free shuttle bus to downtown Philadelphia, on-site fitness center/gym, free wifi in lobby, on-site management, package hold area with email notification, express shipment pickup. Tenant pays only electric and cable. Dry cleaning pick up/delivery; restaurant on first floor. Three Septa bus routes within one block; wheelchair accessible. Trash chute on each floor. No smoking in condo. Sense of community: book club, game night, happy hours, community room, Holiday party, Spring Fling. Close to I-76, I-95, 30th Street Train Station, Kelly Drive, Benjamin Franklin Parkway. Walk to Whole Foods, CVS, many fabulous restaurants, many museums (Barnes, Philadelphia Museum of Art, Franklin Institue, Rodin), Schuylkill River bike/walking trail, Waterworks and Boathouse Row. Absolutely no pets.
Main Floor Laundry Parking available Gym Available Hardwoodfloors
